title: Sheikh Rashidâ€™s elder brother dies
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 17 (APP): The elder brother of  Sheikh Rashid Ahmed, Minister for Interior, Lala Sheikh Rafeeq Qamar died.  His nimaz-e janaza will be offered today (Wednesday) at 6:00 pm at Kot Radha Kishen, the minister tweeted.
